text: Nancy Travis (born September 21, 1961 in New York City) is a television and movie actress. She is known for her roles in many movies, especially in Three Men and a Baby and its sequel Three Men and a Little Lady. She has also been in many television sitcoms. ==Early life== Travis was born in New York City, the daughter of Theresa, a social worker, and Gordon Travis, a sales executive. Travis was raised in Boston, Massachusetts, and Baltimore, Maryland."Nancy Travis- Biography" . Yahoo! Movies. title: Nancy Travis
